sql.update:
UPDATE Department SET Code = @Code, Name=@Name, UpdateTime=@UpdateTime, [Order]=@Order
Description=@Description
ParentCode=@ParentCode
CompanyCode=@CompanyCode
Layer=@Layer
WHERE Id = @Id
sql.update-department-parent-code: update Department set ParentCode=@NewParentCode where ParentCode=@OldParentCode
sql.count-department: select count(*) from Department where CompanyCode = @CompanyCode
